extendedInfo.description: A simple home screen widget that allows toggling phone vibration without altering the ring tone volume.Please email me if you find a bug or want to make me any other comment or feature request.If you like Vibration Widget, please consider installing my other app, Profile Widget, which can do the same as Vibration Widget and a lot more (control vibration, volume, connectivity, screen settings, ...) in a single widget.Profile Widget Lite: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.cygnus.profilewidgetliteProfile Widget Full: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.cygnus.profilewidgetThanks!IMPORTANT NOTE:You have to add the widget to one of your home screens to use it. Just long press on an empty space of your home screen or press the Menu Key and select Add -> Widgets to show a widgets list in which you can choose Vibration Widget.

reviews.title: I cant even find it!
reviews.comment: WTF is this?? I\'ve downloaded it at least 3 times and have rebooted my phone, and it\'s nowhere to be found D:< Total piece of crap. IT LIES!
reviews.author: Silver Harthern

reviews.title: HELP
reviews.comment: \"Vibration is set to only when not in silent mode\" and the widget keeps going back to yellow instead of gray or green. What do I do?!  Help and I will rate 5 stars
reviews.author: Jordan Burkey

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Wanted such an app for so long. Does exactly what it says!!
reviews.author: Saurabh Chaturvedi

reviews.title: Didnt work on LG Nexus-4 : 4.2.2 update :(
reviews.comment: I tired installing tis app on Nexus -4 which has 4.2.2 update..but i didnt find this app at all :( tried rebooting the phone twice but no success :(..I have a issue with my phone wher phone doenst vibrate wen i get any new msg..any solution fr this issue ? I have set vibrate : \"ON\" in the message settings but stil not getting the vibration..:(
reviews.author: sushanth patil

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Does exactly what you think it would
reviews.author: Zachary Werking

reviews.title: It showed up a day later
reviews.comment: The next day it showed up in my widgets tab. It works great, good job. 5 stars for sure.
reviews.author: JD S

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: And... does what it says :) Wish there was a text lable underneath, otherwise it ruins my alignment...
reviews.author: tomer karni

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: The widget is simply brilliant. I\'ve used this previously on my Galaxy S2 n now I\'m using it on Galaxy S3 b Xperia Tx. Simple, effective n very useful
reviews.author: Alok Patil

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work HTC 1
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t do what it says. Tried multiple times to use this widget. Clicked vibrate off and it went right back to vibrate.
reviews.author: rachel maxx

reviews.title: Does What It Says
reviews.comment: This is the only true vibrate toggle that actually does what it says. It toggles (on/off) the vibrate but doesn\'t modify any other settings in the phone. Good utility!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: The only thing I\'ve found that lets you toggle vibrate independently of volume. The icon looks pixelly on high res screens though, any chance of updating it?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: doesn\'t work for all notifications
reviews.comment: For example, google voice still vibrates when in off position. I need a toggle that disables vibrate universally, but at least making this cover google voice would be a great start. I\'d give it 5 stars with that update.
reviews.author: Sean McQuay

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Would not even appear on my phone and made it shut down twice before I went to the app store and uninstalled it
reviews.author: Jordan Heidebrink

reviews.title: 5 STARS!! :D
reviews.comment: Thank you so much!!! Ever since I got my phone it would never vibrate when I got a text (yes vibrate was on). I testedthis out and it worked!! THANK YOU FOR THIS AWESOME APP.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: You really read my mind just turns on and off vibrate. I wish my message vibrate can also be toggled on and off with the help of this same widget
reviews.author: A Google User
